title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler
description: When trying to right click on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is for a popup menu to appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, the popup menu is not being displayed.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Actual behavior: No popup menu is shown.
EB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected behavior: A popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected result: A popup menu should be displayed with options to add breakpoints/marks, etc.

Note: This issue can be reproduced consistently.
